state holland although absent lieutenancy governourship taken without lawful cause chose governour also general manager war proud domineering began daily fight sea land wherein landfights foot spaniard berck came forward cause great slaughter cruelty time garrisond viseo emm ric came berck neither prepard assault siege thereof thing saving canon thing sent underhand state lest seem either party emperour strictly forbidden moreover army supplyed provision neighbor refused rather force willingly spaniard sending continual embassy excusing thereby former miscarriage future promising
